Address: Unit 5/15-17 Bonnie View Road CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136
Description:
STYLISH LIVING IN THE PERFECT LOCALE!
Here's your chance to secure this superb three bedroom single level federation style home in this quality development with all the luxuries and comforts you will ever need. Positioned close to all amenities including shops and transport, yet encompassed by lush green landscaped gardens and tranquil surroundings.
Tastefully presented in neutral tones, this residence offers flowing open plan design with quality carpets, tiling, fixtures & fittings throughout, generous sized living & dining area which leads out to private rear courtyard as well as secure double lock-up garage.
Featuring a modern kitchen with European appliances, ample cupboard and bench space, as well as the three generous bedrooms - master with ensuite, which are fitted with spacious built-in-robes and are serviced by a large central bathroom. As an extra the home also includes split system air conditioning.
Move straight in and find peace of mind while enjoying a low maintenance lifestyle. The estate backs on to Warrien Reserve so you can take advantage of its serene landscapes and walking tracks, and driving into the city will be a breeze with Eastlink just moments away.
Insights: 49 other 3 bedroom house in CROYDON NORTH have recently been sold.

Address: 9/46-48 Bonnie View Road CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136
Description:
IMMACULATE 3 BEDROOM UNIT
Situated on its own title, this property offers an exceptional opportunity for first home buyers, young families and investors.
Surrounded by landscaped gardens on a manageable block of approximately 454 sqm, this single storey brick veneer home has clearly been cherished by its current owners.
Immaculately presented, it boasts two separate living areas, open plan kitchen, three bedrooms all with built in robes and bathroom with en suite effect.
Near new carpets and a reverse cycle heating/cooling unit add comfort to the interior, whilst the spacious backyard, paved entertaining area, single carport and garden shed provide exceptional outdoor inclusions.
Brilliantly located within a short stroll of Croydon North Shopping Plaza, as well as easy access to schools, parks, public transport, Eastlink, Chirnside Park and Eastland Shopping Centres. Inspection is a must!

Description:
Premium Home In Enviable Location - With Views!
Located within a premium pocket of Croydon North and elevated to take full advantage of the picturesque views, this stunning, tri-level, architecturally designed home is perfectly positioned for the busy family close to local amenities.
Framed by exquisite landscaped native gardens, this sophisticated home enjoys an abundance of living space from the inviting formal lounge with Coonara wood heater, flowing through to the open plan casual living zone incorporating the dining, family area and well appointed kitchen comprising stainless steel appliances.
Large picture windows soak up gorgeous sunset views, also relished from the expansive, hand-crafted Merbau decking that wraps around the entire home - there is no shortage of beautiful spaces to relax and entertain.
The master bedroom features a walk-in robe and luxury full ensuite, whilst two additional robed bedrooms share a quality imbued bathroom showcasing a deep soak bath, furthermore, the fourth bedroom/home office is located downstairs, boasting a full ensuite.
With too many inclusions to mention, highlights of the home list as; highly functional laundry, dishwasher, gas ducted heating, split system air-conditioning, high ceilings, Rinnai hot water, security alarm, 5000 litre water tank (pump), fire hose, double glazed windows (front), polished Tasmanian Oak floorboards, brand new carpet, freshly painted, tiered backyard, remote double garage with internal access, workshop/loft storage, ample parking and entry off service road.
Overlooking natural parkland, a plethora of amenities are within close proximity; Hochkins Ridge Reserve, Luther College, Good Shepherd, Yarra Valley Grammar, McAdam Square, Eastland, Croydon North Shopping Plaza, Chirnside Park Shopping Centre and a short commute to EastLink.
This premium home delivers an exceptional lifestyle.
James Brougham : 0412 620 498

Description:
Beautifully Designed 5-BR Home - 1/3 Acre Plus
Imagine a beautifully designed 5 bedroom family sanctuary that seamlessly blends indoor/outdoor living on a big block of about 1434 sqm. Set on the high side of an exclusive street, this spacious one owner home is sure to excite the whole family. A two metre verandah wraps the entire front of the home providing 'all-seasons' protection and relaxation. Colonial-style bay windows and immaculate landscaped gardens also create 'wow-factor'. The inviting, light-filled interior feels good with its hardwood polished floorboards, double-hung windows and modern decor. The children's bedrooms and family bathroom are in their own wing, while parents have a private master suite boasting his/hers BIRs and 2-way ensuite. A study/office (own external access) is perfect for your home business. Delight in zoned formal and informal living areas and a large open plan kitchen fitted with St George appliances and Miele dishwasher. The big family/meals room opens to the north-facing alfresco area (roofed) for easy entertaining. You have further options with a separate dining area and formal lounge room (open fireplace). Parents and children alike will love the tranquil landscaped gardens and basketball ring. Appointments: secure 4-car accommodation (space for a workshop), GDH, evaporative cooling, excellent storage, wired for surround sound and shed. Close to Yarra Rd Primary, Luther College, private schools, Hochkins Ridge Reserve, shops, transport and EastLink. Be quick.
Donna Walpole : 0421 997 827

Description:
A Wonderland in Alice
PROPERTY SOLD
This wonderful family home is not a fairy tale, it's a true wonderland and the perfect home you've always been dreaming of.
On a block of over a 1/4 acre in size in the ever popular Croydon North area the home offers you 4 good sized robed bedrooms, the main with walk in robe and full ensuite.
Zoned living areas provide space for the family to spread out and enjoy with Mum & Dad making the front lounge room their space, whilst the rest of the family will love the large open plan family dining at the back.
The modern gourmet kitchen is well equipped with quality stainless steel appliances, dishwasher plus plenty of bench and cupboard space to ensure the chef of the family is a master chef for any meal occasion.
Before we take in what the outdoors has to offer, we mustn't forget other internal features such as gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, main bathroom with toilet, powder room, polished timber floors, new carpets, feature walls plus light filled interiors, freshly painted with modern colours and tones.
Stepping outside from the family room you can forget about a mad hatters tea party as the undercover entertaining balcony is simply amazing and is much more suitable to enjoy family gatherings, special occasions, parties, casual BBQ's, a cool afternoon drink, a winter warming hot chocolate in front of the open fire or a leisurely weekend breakfast with a coffee and the paper.
The backyard is MASSIVE with manicured lawns to make it a matter of what game to play first, backyard cricket in summer, the AFL grand final in spring or transform it into a white water world with plenty of room for a pool and even then enough space for a full sized tennis court.
Car accommodation is well taken care of with the double carport at the front, visitor parking in the concrete drive, plus side access to the yard behind double gates for the safe off road storage of caravan, boat or trailers.
No need to keep dreaming this wonderland will be a complete reality with your inspection today.
Insights: 20 ALICE STREET, CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2013 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in CROYDON NORTH have recently been sold.

Description:
Style With An Air Of Sophistication
Set back from the road and surrounded by impeccable landscaping and beautiful homes, this classy three bedroom townhouse is ideal for those looking to invest, downsize or professionals searching for a low maintenance home with nothing to do but sit back and relax.
Featuring an open plan design and brand new carpet throughout, the living and dining adjoins the spacious well equipped kitchen compromising an electric oven and stove, dishwasher, breakfast bar and timeless white cabinetry. Adding to the available entertaining space, step outside and relish the extensively paved and private low maintenance courtyard-the perfect spot to enjoy the warmer weather.
The bedrooms are of generous proportions; the master delivers two double mirror built-in robes whilst the additional bedrooms contain double built-in robes and share a family sized bathroom, furthermore, the home is made comfortable by inclusions such as; gas ducted heating, split system air-conditioning, Euro laundry, security alarm and remote double garage with internal and pedestrian access.
The landscaped garden complements the rendered facade, with the added benefit of living in an ultra convenient location close to Hughes Park with playground and BBQ, Village Primary School, Oxley College and other good schools, public transport, Maroondah Highway leading to EastLink and Chirnside Park Shopping Centre.
This stylish residence will appeal to those who demand the best.
Photo ID Required
Carl Payne : 0413 589 800

Description:
INSPIRING FROM FRONT TO BACK
Satisfying all the criteria that makes a house a home, this inspiring property provides great space, a remarkable family component, is convenient to everything and boasts a beautiful backdrop at the rear and inviting senses from the front, with creeper roses that show off a pretty charm to the facade.
The highly sought after location offers a selection of quality schools close by, including Yarra Road and Croydon Primary Schools, Luther College, The Good Shepherd and Yarra Valley Grammar. Local shopping can be done at McAdam Square, with bus links leading to Croydon, Chirnside and Ringwood.
Arranged over two levels, the family qualities will far outweigh your expectations. Kids have their own zone downstairs with two of the four bedrooms positioned down there, as well as a spacious rumpus room, bathroom and access to the back yard.
Elevated views can be appreciated from the open plan kitchen and family/meals zone that accommodate the ground level, whilst a more formal retreat can be found in the lounge room, adjacent to the master, 2nd bedroom and dual access bathroom.
Ducted heating, hardwood floors, split air conditioning, top and bottom outdoor sitting areas, a secure family yard and a double garage fulfill all the little extras that bring together this superb home that will reach above and beyond your needs.

Description:
Spacious Living In Quiet, Leafy Court
Step up in space, size and comfort!
Located in a quiet, tranquil court, this highly desirable home is perched on a large 1/4 acre block (1150m2 approx) and is the ideal home to raise a family.
Oozing the comfort and warmth of home, this beautiful residence offers generous proportions, showcasing a formal sun drenched lounge and adjoining dining, flowing through to a casual meals area and steps up to a large family zone serviced by a timber kitchen comprising; electric oven, ceramic cook top, dishwasher, ample cupboards/bench space, breakfast bar, servery to dining and easy access to the delightful, covered outdoor entertaining area.
The floor plan is ideal for a family who enjoys spending time together yet affords the space and size to spread out. The master features a walk-in robe and full ensuite, the second bedroom has double built-in robes whilst the two additional bedrooms are zoned at the rear of the home and contain twin double built-in robes.
The home is well appointed, showcasing a luxury family bathroom with spa, sizable laundry with cupboards, slate floor in meals, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, air-conditioning, large secure backyard with abundant room for kids/pets, awnings, shed, double garage and plenty of off-street parking.
Walk to Griff Hunt Reserve, Village Primary School, Croydon North Shopping Plaza and enjoy easy access to Maroondah Highway and Chirnside Park Shopping Centre.
This home truly captures the essence of fine family living.
James Brougham : 0412 620 498

Description:
Vacant Land In Premium Location At Council Valuation
Located near the end of a no 'through road' and set in a leafy green landscape, this block makes a beautiful homesite. The sloping block has a bushy verge (council greenbelt) at the rear.
The size is 864 sqare meters on two levels and within walking distance of schools, McAdam Square shops and bus routes. Easy access to Ringwood Eastlink and Croydon station. A great place to live with all amenities close by.

Description:
Development Opportunity Set to Go!
All the hard work in obtaining plans and permits has been done for this brilliantly positioned opportunity, perfectly placed to offer an ideal setting for four brand new townhouses.
The townhouses design captures the essence of modern contemporary living, delivering a variety of floor plans to suit the individual need of astute low-maintenance buyers.
Buyers will have a choice of two or three bedrooms, three of which include a master bedroom with walk in robe and stylish ensuite.
Some have an extra retreat upstairs, while all showcase stunning open plan living, dining and a gourmet kitchen, entertaining courtyard and single or double remote control garage.
The 1,127 square metre (approx.) canvas for these four fantastic townhouses is located within walking distance to the local shopping centre, primary school, buses & park.

Description:
NEAT AS A PIN COURT HOME
Superbly positioned within the desirable treed court in 868m2 groomed gardens is this classic neat as pin brick veneer original home. The timeless comfort of a gas heated living/dining room, neat kitchen with meals area and view over garden, 3 bedrooms each with built in robes plus neat bathroom with separate shower and a laundry is all this home requires for easy living. Having a double garage at the side, small pleasant park opposite and being only a short level stroll from bus and shopping plaza of Croydon North is more than enough to make this much loved and cared for home your own. Also possible STCA

Description:
Family Friendly and Ready to Enjoy
In a sought-after cul de sac & ready for enjoyment, this beautiful home is perfect for the young or growing family, investors & first home buyers alike. Set on a lovely garden block of 863m2 (approx), you'll first notice the appeal of the delightful front garden & classic street presence. Step inside & discover a clever interior with formal lounge, separate dining & a huge casual living zone. Comprising 4 bedrooms plus a study, the master also has a walk in robe & ensuite. The galley style kitchen has gas hot plates, electric oven & ample storage. Outdoors there's a covered entertainers deck, spacious & private lawn area & cubby house for children to play, landscaped gardens & even room for the chooks! Car buffs & tradies will love the huge carport, with room for 4 cars plus a garage sized workshop at the rear. Extras include solar panels, ducted heating, air conditioning, loads of off street parking & a location that has transport, quality schools, shops & parks all close by.
Naiomi Bentley : 0404 036 044

Description:
Modern Family Living with Stunning Outlooks
In an elevated position on 749SQM(approx), this beautifully presented home offers a truly peaceful location, stunning views from almost every room and all the creature comforts a family home should have. Bright and inviting, it features three bedrooms plus study/4th bedroom, two bathrooms, powder room, open plan living with a modern kitchen offering plenty of bench space and formal lounge and dining. Capped off with an impeccable outdoor zone, the undercover BBQ area provides an ideal setting for relaxing or entertaining while the balcony is the perfect place to take in the views.
Also features:
*3 beds with BIRs, main with ensuite & dbl vanity
*Freshly painted exterior; Sub-floor storage
*Gas ducted heating & evaporative ducted A/C
*Remote DLUG with internal access; Water tank
*Moments to local shops & public transport
*Walk to Luther College, near to Yarra Valley Grammar

Description:
Family Focussed with Five Star Finishes
An impressive atrium entrance is a compelling prelude to this quiet country-like lifestyle. Uniquely spacious and sleek with a multitude of premier inclusions and a level zoned floorplan that attracts sunlight and perspective, this acre approx, 6 Bedroom plus study home sustains a sense of warmth and intimacy along with its large proportions. Master exclusively zoned with delightful garden views, ensuite and WIR and supported by 3 modern bathrooms for busy families. Centrally sited, the expansive granite Kitchen Meals elegantly appointed with s/s appliances incl. double oven and dishwasher, flows through to a feature Rumpus with wetbar, progressing outside to an undercover pergola with mains gas BBQ, North/South Flexi Pave tennis court and spa nestled under an oasis of palms. Designed for engaging and seamless living, the formal Lounge and Dining zone with OFP provide ample space to entertain in modest or grand numbers. Convenient access to McAdam Square shops, Yarra Road Primary, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar. Walk to Hochkins Ridge Flora and Fauna Reserve and close to buses, with connections to the Freeway. Additional premium features: Slab heating, Rinnai gas heating, split system a/c, slate flooring, 2 hot water services, 3 phase power, ducted vacuum, utilities shed and double garage plus 4 car carport and OSP.
Land: 4111 sq.metres approx

Description:
Coveted family lifestyle with pool and tennis court!
Expressions of Interest by Tuesday 8 October at 5pm (Unless Sold Prior)
Experience the exclusive privacy and peace only offered by the bowl of a court. This expansive Glenvill Home is an oasis for families of all ages, featuring 4 bedrooms, a fully-appointed study, separate living areas and a resort-inspired backyard! Upon entry, you'll be awed by the 3.8m ceilings featuring in the lounge and family rooms, flooding the house with sunlight and enhancing the sense of space.
Overlooking the dining area and covered deck, the sunny kitchen with a bay window features granite benchtops and stainless steel Smeg cooking appliances plus a Miele dishwasher. 4 carpeted bedrooms with built-in robes are serviced by 2 spacious contemporary bathrooms, including the luxurious master bedroom with a spa ensuite and deck access.
Accompanying a modern 8-seater spa, the solar-heated, salt-chlorinated pool is fully-tiled and framed by tropical palms and shrubs. Extensive decking ensures ample entertaining and dining spaces in any weather, from the semi-enclosed covered deck to a separate open area with a cantilever umbrella. With a north-south orientation the floodlit tennis court has hosted many family tournaments and there's ample storage sheds for bicycles and all your sports gear! Further inclusions: gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ceiling fans, ducted vacuum, security alarm, exceptional storage, powder room and a double garage with a remote-controlled door.
Walking distance from buses and Yarra Road Primary School, this deluxe family haven is close to Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, Croydon Hills Primary School, Hochkins Ridge Flora Reserve and local shops, close to Chirnside Park and Eastland shopping centres.
* Pool, spa and tennis court
* Multiple living areas
* Spa ensuite
* Well-appointed study
* Smeg & Miele kitchen appliances
* Close to private schools
10% deposit, balance 120 days
Land: 2,751 sq m approx.

Description:
Peaceful and Private
A peaceful and private lifestyle awaits the purchasers of this stunning as-new townhouse. In a secluded rear position surrounded by contemporary landscaped gardens, the 2 storey home offers a possible 4 bedrooms or the option of 3 bedrooms plus a study and open living spaces on both levels.
In immaculately presented condition with quality fittings and finishes and a chic modern colour scheme, the ground level comprises a spacious living/meals area, smart Caesarstone kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances, rangehood, dishwasher and corner pantry and a peaceful rear alfresco deck from which to enjoy the northern sun and surrounding trees and bird life. The main bedroom and ensuite are also on this level whilst upstairs is a further versatile living space with 2 robed bedrooms and a 4th bedroom/study.
The ducted heating and air-conditioning is zoned for each level and extra features include alarm system, double auto garage and water tank.
Opposite parklands and within walking distance of Village School and Croydon North Shopping Plaza; a short drive to Croydon and Mooroolbark Stations and shops, several primary schools, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar and Chirnside Park Shopping Centre.
* 4 bedroom as-new townhouse
* Private and peaceful rear position
* Kitchen/living/meals plus secluded rear deck
* Main bedroom and ensuite on ground level
* 3 bedrooms plus living area upstairs
* Walk to Croydon North Shopping Plaza
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 60/90 days
Land: Subdivision

Description:
TOP PRESENTATION IN AN IDEAL LOCATION
Positioned in a beautiful leafy street in Croydon North, this superbly presented property on 805m2 (approx.) offers the ideal balance of indoor and outdoor living.
Complimentary to the floral gardens is the three bedroom home that has been kept in exceptional condition, which is highlighted in the presentation of both bathrooms and in the kitchen. Rich Parquetry floors add a hint of difference, connecting the kitchen with the casual family/meals area, with a spacious lounge and dining room for a more formal environment.
A young couple or small family will want to leap at this property being so close to amenities such as bus links, a terrific selection of schools nearby, as well as being close to Eastland, Chirnside, Croydon and Exeter Road shopping centres. Alternatively, down-sizers will enjoy the gardens and the peaceful surrounds, and investors will see the potential to add to their portfolio.
Features include: Ducted heating, air conditioners and an over-sized double carport.
Insights: 12 Oaktree Road, CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2013 and 49 other 3 bedroom house in CROYDON NORTH have recently been sold.

Address: 11/46-48 Bonnie View Road CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136
Description:
ALL YOU NEED IS RIGHT HERE!!
And look at the price. Situated on a manicured manageable block of 389m2 (approx.) this terrific north facing 3 bedroom home has all the creature comforts you could desire.
Formal sun kissed lounge room, main bedroom with two way bathroom, neutral tones throughout plus light bright interior, open plan kitchen with adjoining family room leading out to large entertaining area, ideal for kids, BBQs etc. and room to move Dont forget gas heating and 2yr old evaporative cooling throughout to boot, flyscreens ,down lights and open carport and garden shed.
Ideally suiting the young couple, retirees or even investors as there is nothing needed to do, just walk straight in and enjoy! Close to shops, schools and buses and conveniently located in a bush setting and quiet locality Priced to attract all buyers this two living zoned home wont last long in todays market Capitalize on the low interest rates and secure your financial future!!

Description:
Auction this Sat at 11am Unless Sold Prior
Commanding, awe-inspiring views of the Yarra Valley and Mount Dandenong from Croydon's Birts Hill, the highest geographical point in metropolitan Melbourne, are the showpiece of this magnificent home. Set on 1650SQM(approx) in a truly tranquil locale, this is an opportunity not to be missed. Fully renovated and showcasing quality finishes throughout, the home features four bedrooms plus a 5th bedroom/study option, open plan kitchen and living and an elegantly-styled lounge and dining area equipped with a stunning open fireplace. Downstairs, the rumpus conveniently has its own entrance, wet bar/kitchenette and powder room making it ideal as extended family accommodation or for executive couples with a home business. Beautifully framed by lush gardens, this immaculate home is completed with a swimming pool and an expansive balcony and paved outdoor entertainment area perfect for alfresco dining or simply enjoying the sweeping views.
Also features:
*Vaulted ceilings; Stone benches & SS appliances
*Main bed with ensuite & spa; Built-in robes (all beds)
*15000L water tank connected to auto watering system
*Gas central heating, gas-lit fire & refrigerated AC
*Remote DLUG with internal access; Carport
*Moments to public transport & local shops
*Walk to Luther College & close to Yarra Valley Grammar
Insights: 47-49 Richardson Road, CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2020 and 16 other 5 bedroom house in CROYDON NORTH have recently been sold.

Description:
Stunning Vistas and Double the Space
Wake up to stunning views of the magnificent Dandenong Ranges from this outstanding family residence, in walking distance to Luther College and Good Shepherd Primary, commanding space and sunlight with its lofty Cathedral ceilings and magnificent expanse of windows. The flexible family-friendly layout is spread over 2 levels; upstairs is appointed with 2 bathrooms, 3 double sized bedrooms all stylishly renovated with BIRs, Master with WIR and ensuite with luxurious double frameless shower and stone vanity. Formal and informal living spaces impress with Lounge and Dining divided by a charming central OFP, and an adjoining Rumpus room ideal for games, with a casual Family Meals overseen by an executive Kitchen showcasing Caesarstone benchtops, walk in pantry, Ilve stainless steel oven and Euro appliances. The lower level is designed for extended family, growing teens or a possible home studio/office with 2 additional robed bedrooms, study, bathroom and Euro laundry with exclusive Family Meals Kitchen spaces and external access to your restful low maintenance bush gardens, where there are ample pockets to entertain and relax, plus an alfresco covered entertaining deck. A short drive to Yarra Valley Grammar and easy access to shops, buses, Croydon Station, Eastlink and the Freeway. The home is further enhanced by GDH, split system AC/heating, powder room, polished boards, ample storage including a workshop and cellar, 2 x water tanks 3,300 and 2 x double carports plus OSP.
Land: 1925 sq. metres approx.
Insights: 1 Faull Close, CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136 was last sold in 2020 and 16 other 5 bedroom house in CROYDON NORTH have recently been sold.
